item.title: Seasalt.ai Becomes a Reseller of Twilio Flex
item.description: Seasalt.ai signed a reseller agreement with Twilio to resell Twilioâ€™s flagship SaaS product Twilio Flex, becoming one of few resellers on the market to directly sell Twilio Flex to end customers.

item.title: Twilio and Seasalt.ai Expand Partnership in Asia Pacific & Japan to Build Multi-Country Cloud Contact Centers
